item.description:
We're holding an informal get-together at 3 pm on Saturday, 12 April in Java Jo's cafe (3710 Washington St. in Jamaica Plain, near the Forest Hills station). This should be a relaxed and fun opportunity to meet up and chat, maybe get a drink or something to eat, so stop by and bring your friends.

There's no agenda, but we will probably touch on upcoming events, including an antiwar action on Friday, 18 April, a fundraising party/concert in May, a regional antiwar organizing conference at Tufts on 25-26 April, and of course lots of May Day activities. We also have presidential and congressional campaigns well under way, and will give updates about recent developments and future prospects.

All are welcome, nothing is required. For more information, check out any of
www.spboston.org
www.sp-usa.org
www.vote-socialist.org
www.VoteSocialist2007.org
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with a ponytail and a YPSL shirt with (three arrows and the legend "Socialism in Our Time").
